description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice at will, turning them into a Freezing Human. The user can instantly freeze anything that comes in contact with them and manipulate ice on a massive scale.
strengths: Can create ice on a massive scale
Can freeze seawater, reducing its Devil Fruit weakening effect
Extremely powerful even by Logia standards
weaknesses: Vulnerable to heat and fire-based attacks
Easily countered by magma-based Devil Fruits
As a solid-state Logia, cannot let attacks pass through as easily as fluid Logias
Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (seawater, Seastone, Haki)

keyMoments.description: Hie Hie no Mi debuts when Aokiji first appears
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the most powerful Logia-type Devil Fruits

culturalSignificance: The Hie Hie no Mi represents one of the three Admiral-level Devil Fruits, establishing the power hierarchy of the World Government's military forces. Its introduction demonstrates the vast gap between the Straw Hats and the Marines' elite.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to emit special Noro Noro Beams that slow down any object or person they hit for 30 seconds. The user becomes a Noroma Human.
strengths: Can slow down any object or person hit by the beam
Can be used tactically to create traps
Useful for both offense and defense
weaknesses: Beam can be reflected with mirrors

keyMoments.description: Foxy uses Noro Noro Beam to trap the Straw Hats
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tactical applications of the Slow-Slow Fruit

culturalSignificance: The Noro Noro no Mi, while not particularly powerful in raw strength, demonstrates how creativity and tactics can make even unconventional Devil Fruits formidable.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that turns the user's body into rubber, giving them the properties of rubber including stretching and immunity to blunt attacks and electricity.
strengths: Body can stretch to extreme lengths
Can inflate body parts for increased power
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cutting and piercing attacks

keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts Gomu Gomu no Koma technique
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's continued innovation with his Devil Fruit abilities

culturalSignificance: The Gomu Gomu no Mi is central to Luffy's fighting style and character, representing his adaptability and creative problem-solving.
